Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; img-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; connect-src 'self' https://*.amazonaws.com https://*.amazoncognito.com

default-src 'self' data: gap:  https://fonts.googleapis.com; style-src 'self'; font-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com; script-src 'self';  media-src *; frame-src: https://youtube.com/
